# NSFontCollection.Name

**Structure**

The constants represent the standard mutable collection names—these names are included in the list of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/allFontCollectionNames]–they have special meaning to the Cocoa font system and should not be hidden or renamed.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Name
```

## Type Properties

- **allFonts**: All fonts in the system.
- **user**: Per-user unmodifiable collection.
- **favorites**: Font collection of the user’s preferred font descriptors.
- **recentlyUsed**: Font collection automatically maintained by NSFontManager.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**
- **init(rawValue:)**

## Naming the Font Collection

- **rename(fromName:visibility:toName:)**: Renames the font collection with the specified name and visibility to the second name specified.
- **show(_:withName:visibility:)**: Make the given font collection visible by giving it a name.
- **hide(withName:visibility:)**: Remove from view the named font collection with the specified visibility.
- **allFontCollectionNames**: Returns all named collections visible to this process.
- **NSFontCollection.Visibility**: Constants that specify the visibility of font collections.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
